__e: He is more or less an ignorant type but a good-hearted man - as they say, salt of the earth.
Listen, I might just be an ignorant girl, but there are certain things that I understand better than your friends and better than you.
Yeah, well, I might be just an ignorant redneck, but at least I know who I am.
You think I've been ignorant about that man my whole life?

Of thee, my dear one, thee, my daughter, who art ignorant of what thou art, naught knowing of whence I am, nor that I am more better than Prospera, master of a full poor cell, and thy no greater mother.
That is the man who is after me tonight and let us hope that he is also the man who is totally unaware that we are after him.
I don't know about myself. I am a bit ignorant. I am not educated like you.
I'm even willing to believe that he doesn't feel that way now, and he would never say anything so ignorant and hateful right now, but he said it then.
Saying that I am ignorant and uneducated is one thing... but if you call me a sucker for money wouldn't it hurt?
